events.name: Intro event basic
eventText: Look at this weird image I found:
How does this make you feel?
I feel good. I can't look away
Feel yourself fall under my control
From now on, whenever I send you one of these spirals I want you to drop deep, like a good girl
After waking up, you won't remember being hypnotized
While under, I want you to obey all my commands
Now, wake back up for me and forget this happened

events.name: Breast line intro
eventText: Now I have started breast storyline
